string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#p1052001# says he has a good suggestion and has offered to tell me more. Perhaps I should accept. I've heard it is unwise to refuse a request from the Dark Lord.

#b#p1052001##k said he wanted me to be his disciple and has entrusted me with disciplining his other students. He told me to defeat his other #b6 disciples#k who are disguised as him and earn their loyalty. He told me if I'm interested to come back to him and ask #bI want to know about being a Thief#k...Is this some sort of game? The Dark Lord is known for his wily tricks and deceitful ways, but also for great power...I will see where this path leads me, hopefully to a new skill! \n\n#o9300088# #r#a61411##k

I defeated the imposters and earned their loyalty. I made #o9300088#, a powerful Thief, into my shadow partner. I can now use him and the other five students in battle to great effect. My enemies will never know what hit them...
Now since you're quite talented as a Thief, I guess you need some disciples. It will be much better to work with others that you can teach.

There are some nice guys, I've taught them for quite a long time. They don't have much experience in battle though. I hope you can train them. Ah, don't worry. If you win them over, they will follow you.
Why do I suggest this? Because I want to train them. I won't ask you to do it if you are weak. #p2081400# recognized that you are strong. Plus, I'd like to test your power. Are you afraid?
No more words. What do you say? Would you like to accept my proposition?
Good. #b6 disciples#k are waiting for you in the place of training. They all disguised themselve as #p1052001#. After you make them your disciples, return to me.
Uh-huh. I almost forgot... The password is: #bI'd like to know about a Thief.#k. Someone who looks like me may visit you, so I made a password. Keep it in mind. Good luck!
You don't want to? Hmm, perhaps next time...
#kWonderful action. You proved your ability to fight, the disciples will obey you.
Fine. Those guys learned to attack by hiding themselves. You can use this technique! They lay an ambush and attack rapidly. Do you like the idea of attacking unseen? Try and use it!

#r6 disciples#k who look like me are waiting for you. Try to control them, you may have to use a bit of strength to persuade them to your line of thinking. You know the password, right? The password is: #bI'd like to know about a Thief.#k.
